1370: Sara moved to Cromme straet.C.8 after marriage.
Got married to Michiel at age 22 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Heideric in 1371 at age 23.
1372: Gave birth to Woutgerus in 1372 at age 24.
1373: Gave birth to Brundonis in 1373 at age 25.
1376: Gave birth to Emgelberna in 1376 at age 28.
1380: Lost daughter Brundonis when Brundonis was 8 years old.
1383: Gave birth to Nellen in 1383 at age 35.
1386: Gave birth to Maelkin in 1386 at age 38.
1392: Lost daughter Emgelberna when Emgelberna was 17 years old.
